title: starting game
body: hey i been having some issues with the fact that everytime i start a game of any kind it crashes and also makes my computer crash. i have tried not starting a game after an hour or even immediately after restarting my computer and it still crashes. I hear a popping sound then it freezes i hope someone can help me.

replies.body: Have you recently updated Windows 10?  There's been an issue causing crashes for some players, and caused by the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) being auto-enabled.  Disabling that should help!  If not, let me know when you're crashing exactly and what error messages you're receiving.  Let me know!
